name: Unstable Slime
description:
You play as a slime that was captured by a crazy alchemist and has gone through many  crazed experiments...

One day you manage to escape and jump down the tower into its lower parts, but as you soon find out the alchemist has laid many traps and obstacles in your way.

And the many experiments seems to have had some side effects... 


Have fun :)

Slime and icons: Made by us
Tiles: https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-dungeon-pack
Music: https://opengameart.org/content/8bit-monstervania-track-1
